title: Ruins (west)

properties.value: The ruins are all that remain of the Zarosian fortress and village once known as Dareeyak. The ruins are located in the Wilderness west of the Bandit Camp and south of the Forgotten Cemetery. These ruins have many tiles and about 10 planks scattered about and are infested with many giant spiders and bears. A lone anvil is one of the few usable artefacts remaining. There is also a hammer and a cake tin. The building in the north-east also drops a small fishing net and fishing bait.

Dark Warriors' Fortress

The ruins are all that remain of the Zarosian fortress and village once known as Dareeyak. The ruins are located in the Wilderness west of the Bandit Camp and south of the Forgotten Cemetery. These ruins have many tiles and about 10 planks scattered about and are infested with many giant spiders and bears. A lone anvil is one of the few usable artefacts remaining. There is also a hammer and a cake tin. The building in the north-east also drops a small fishing net and fishing bait.

With the Wilderness Rejuvenation update, the Crazy archaeologist can be found roaming the northern area of the ruins. Passing players should be careful as he is aggressive and will attack players on sight. It is advised that players who wish to explore this area for reasons other than clue scrolls or bossing, should use F2P worlds as the "Crazy archaeologist" will not be present.

Contents

  • 1 Getting there
  • 2 History
  • 3 Monsters
  • 4 Music unlocked

Getting there[edit | edit source]

Players can easily access these ruins with the Dareeyak Teleport, requiring Desert Treasure, 78 Magic, two law runes, three fire runes and two air runes to use. Alternatively, players can use a burning amulet to teleport to Bandit Camp, exit south, and run north-west a short distance.

History[edit | edit source]

Dareeyak was one of Zaros's fortresses in the area now known as the Wilderness. It was destroyed during the Third Age, an age also now known simply as the God Wars. The fortress' demise came about when Zarosian soldiers were destroyed by followers of Zamorak and Saradomin.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Crazy archaeologist
  • Giant rats
  • Spiders
  • Grizzly bears

Music unlocked[edit | edit source]

  • Troubled

The '''ruins''' are all that remain of the [[Zarosian]] fortress and village once known as '''Dareeyak'''. The ruins are located in the [[Wilderness]] west of the [[Bandit Camp (Wilderness)|Bandit Camp]] and south of the [[Forgotten Cemetery]]. These ruins have many [[tile]]s and about 10 [[plank]]s scattered about and are infested with many [[giant spider]]s and [[bear]]s. A lone [[anvil]] is one of the few usable artefacts remaining. There is also a [[hammer]] and a [[cake tin]]. The building in the north-east also drops a [[small fishing net]] and [[fishing bait]].

With the [[Update:Rejuvenating the Wilderness: More risk, more reward|Wilderness Rejuvenation]] update, the [[Crazy archaeologist]] can be found roaming the northern area of the ruins. Passing players should be careful as he is [[aggressive]] and will attack players on sight. It is advised that players who wish to explore this area for reasons other than [[clue scroll]]s or bossing, should use F2P worlds as the "Crazy archaeologist" will not be present.

==Getting there==
Players can easily access these ruins with the [[Dareeyak Teleport]], requiring [[Desert Treasure]], 78 [[Magic]], two [[law runes]], three [[fire runes]] and two [[air runes]] to use. Alternatively, players can use a [[burning amulet]] to teleport to [[Bandit Camp (Wilderness)|Bandit Camp]], exit south, and run north-west a short distance.

==History==
'''Dareeyak''' was one of [[Zaros]]'s fortresses in the area now known as the [[Wilderness]]. It was destroyed during the [[Third Age]], an age also now known simply as the [[God Wars]]. The fortress' demise came about when Zarosian soldiers were destroyed by followers of [[Zamorak]] and [[Saradomin]].
